商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Aqua Blue Gingham尺寸: Large
留言內容: Amazon Basics are consistently well made and affordable. This shirt is no exception. It’s true to size and 100% cotton as advertised. I bought two, in different colors, and I like them both.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Washed Red Plaid尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: The cotton fabric is just right.  Substantial but soft.  The stitching and construction are impressively good a this price point. The fabric print is aligned and matched among the various panels--like where the sleeve meets the body of the shirt, and where the patch pocket attached to the main body part.  I did not expect to find those details on a shirt this inexpensive.  Resists wrinkles pretty well.The fit is what I'd call "slightly tapered" from shoulder to waist, and not not a roomy traditional fit.  If, like me, you want a roomier fit, I suggest you order the next size larger than your dress shirt size.  Unfortunately, it is increasingly difficult to find shirts that have a true traditional fit.  This shirt does not have that traditional fit.  I think shirtmakers are trying to make a single, so-called "universal" or "regular" fit shirt model--not as fitted as a fitted cut, and not a full as a traditional cut.  In that way, they think they do not have to offer multiple models in different fits.  It's too bad, because I need to size up to get a roomer fit around the waist, which ends up being too roomy at the shoulders. On this shirt, the taper is moderate, so it is a tolerable compromise.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 修身顏色: Medium Blue尺寸: Medium
留言內容: The material and construction are fine. However, I have issues with the fit. I usually wear a size medium in a button front shirt. Based on reviews that the Amazon Essentials chambray shirts often run a bit large, I first purchased the Amazon Essentials Men's Slim-Fit Short-Sleeve Chambray Shirt, Medium Blue, Size Medium. The fit was mostly good, except that it was tight across the back of the shoulders if you reach both arms straight forward. I wanted a second shirt, but with a better fit.Next I purchased the Amazon Essentials Men's Short-Sleeve Chambray Shirt, Light Blue, Size Medium. I thought that this regular fit shirt would fit me better. Surprisingly, it fit exactly the same as the medium slim-fit shirt. The fit was mostly good, but still tight across the back of the shoulders. I can’t detect any difference in the fit compared to the slim-fit.I like both shirts and enjoy wearing them. I don’t know if trying a large size (slim-fit or regular fit) would be better.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Denim Large Plaid尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: Really nice shirt and comfortable. Does exactly what a shirt is supposed to do. Fit is good, not overly big or small. Worth the purchase.

留言內容: I got this as a present for my husband, and not only does he look great it in, he really loves it too. The shirt fits him well, not too snug and not too boxy or roomy as to be unflattering. He has worn it to a few fests, and it looks great and doesn't wrinkle. He's gotten a lot of compliments on it from people passing by - seems to be a hit!

留言內容: They are a lot of brands that I get a medium but this shirt was too long and big for me. It has a really loose and baggy look when you try it on.

SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Blue Checked尺寸: Large
留言內容: Every stripe, plaid, pocket and collar lined or matched up. Wash great, but cold water and dry only half way just to get the wrinkles out and hang dry the rest. Best $15.00 summer shirt you'll ever want. I have five. Not quite "No Tuck" length, but you can get five of these for the price of one of them.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Blue White Plaid尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: Weird cut in the pits makes them feel smaller than the same size I have in a wholesale club brand. They are just a tad bit small in the armpits but regular everywhere else. I know I would be swimming in it in a XXL and the XL already feels big in the belly. I won’t buy this brand again but I won’t send them back either. The cut is just not great and not as good as what I am used to in off brands. Now that I have washed them I also notice that they are not as wrinkle resistant as the wholesale club versions I have either. I will probably donate these as soon as they start selling this style of shirt again.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 修身顏色: Grey尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: Was really enjoying the shirt, the fit the comfortable fabric, the value.  I wore it for the first time today as I went out for a full day of shopping.  I found the front pockets convenient as they served to store my facemask when I went from car to store to car.  Unfortunately it would be in one of these trips that would bring a sudden end to my perfect shirt.  One clumsy step from my wife led to her grabbing my shirt to brace her fall.  The shirt did not tear, however a button was lost in the incident.  Unfortunately I didn't realize the button was lost until I was reaching for my face mask at store number 3.  I immediately felt for the extra buttons that shirts have on the back of the bottom front seam and found nothing. I then felt for the tag on the inside seam to see if the spare button was there, but found nothing.  The one time I need the extra button and I am without.  These are unique buttons and not like any in my button jar.  So this perfect shirt will now go in the closet as a reminder of the time my wife slipped in her wedges and sadly to never be worn again.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Navy Medium Plaid尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: I think it's a good looking shirt. I asked my wife what she thought, and she said it "makes a statement." Which I think means she thinks its ugly, but whatever.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Blue Floral尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: Allow me to start with the print being great and the shirt is light and comfortable. I initially selected the XL size but I had to return it because it was cut to small across the shoulder and back. If I had to eat, I probably would have blown out the seams in the armpit and split the back. Amazon has a fantastic return service that I made use of and switched to the XXL. The XXL fits much better in the back and shoulders and adds a little room to the chest and neck - all wonderful. And then I lifted my arms over my head and discovered it’s a belly shirt, the length is too short. I like the print so much that I’m keeping the shirt; I just won’t ever tuck it and I will need to wear a t-shirt underneath. Amazon, any chance of a XXXL or cutting tall sizes?  I really like the shirt.

留言內容: Shirt fabric is nice. It is cut more for a slimmer man. My husband is an average size and this shirt was too snug.

SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Aqua Blue Gingham尺寸: X-Small
留言內容: I bought this shirt for my son as it's difficult to find nice shirts otherwise and I'm quite pleased with the purchase. The material is very soft and has a little stretch to it. I washed it before he wore it and the color was still vibrant afterwards. For reference, my son is 14 years old, waist is 28", his chest measures 31" so I ordered size XS . It's a bit big for him but once it's tucked in, it's no longer obvious.  I recommend this shirt!!

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Blue White Plaid尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: If you have a blue eyed guy and want his eyes to really stand out, this is the shirt for you. I bought this shirt for my daughters significant boy friend for a trip they are taking. He looks terrific in it. He sayS he really likes it and he sure does look good in it to. The material is soft and wrinkle free. So far it washed and dries nicely. I couldn’t be happier with it and my girl loves it on him.

留言內容: I bought two Try and Buy Shirts, one Large and one Extra Large. The Extra Large fit, but I returned the Large as it was too tight. The shirt runs a little on the small side. I washed the shirts as directed but ended up with a very wrinkled shirt that needed to be ironed. So, if you are looking for a no-iron shirt, don't pick this one!

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Black Grey Plaid尺寸: Medium
留言內容: Not a terrible shirt, but it runs small. Not as roomy as most "medium" shirts I have worn. The sleeves are a bit short. It has a tendency to wrinkle; probably better to hang dry than tumble dry. A decent shirt for the money, just be aware that it is a bit small.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫
SKU: 配合類型: 常規顏色: Blue White Plaid尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: These are very comfortable warm weather shirts.  The length is right for those of us who wear shirts tucked in, and they're roomy enough as well.  (I'm 6 feet and a little fat and the XL fits nicely.)  It's great to find quality 100% cotton shirts for just $15 each.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款 Regular-Fit 短袖府綢襯衫

留言內容: I like the shirt and for me it looks great unbuttoned over a nice t shirt! If buttoned it's a little unflattering in the belly area for a bigger guy. I'm 6ft 255 lbs if that helps any other buyers.
